metadata.title: CVE-2016-10188 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in bitlbee-libpurple before 3.5 allows remoteservers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrarycode by causing a file transfer connection to expire.

criterions.comment: bitlbee: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
